channel.description: Recent content in Git on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Git: How to add a submodule in the root of your project - Try Git SubTree instead
item.description: This is just a short post and the title says it all … I’ve wanted add submodules to a Git repository but you get an error if you try.

item.title: Managing a WordPress plugin with SVN and Git
item.description: I’m not trying to torture myself — which is why for the past 18 months managing my plugins in the WordPress SVN repository has been separated from my development work which is all saved in Git (Bitbucket to be totally honest).

item.title: HOW TO: Install Jenkins-CI on a Mac OS X with Git - Bitbucket
item.description: A few notes on getting Jenkins-CI installed on your Mac and setup with Git and Bitbucket for source code management.
